tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE experimental_tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    completion_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE experimental_tasks (
  task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  task_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  completion_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE experiment_results (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  task_id INT,
  result_description TEXT,
  success_rate FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES experimental_tasks(task_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ExperimentalTasks (
  task_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  task_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  assigned_to VARCHAR(50),
  progress_status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'Not Started',
  due_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ExperimentResults (
  result_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  task_id INTEGER REFERENCES ExperimentalTasks(task_id),
  result_data TEXT,
  completion_status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'Incomplete',
  completion_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE TaskComments (
  comment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  task_id INTEGER REFERENCES ExperimentalTasks(task_id),
  comment TEXT,
  commenter_name VARCHAR(50),
  comment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE experimental_tasks (
  task_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  task_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'Pending'
);

CREATE TABLE task_assignees (
  assignee_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  task_id INT REFERENCES experimental_tasks(task_id),
  assignee_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  assignee_email TEXT NOT NULL,
  assignee_role VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE task_progress (
  progress_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  task_id INT REFERENCES experimental_tasks(task_id),
  progress TEXT,
  date_completed DATE,
  notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255),
    task_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Experiments (
    experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    experimenter_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (experimenter_id) REFERENCES Experimenters(experimenter_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Tasks_Experiments (
    task_id INT,
    experiment_id INT,
    task_duration INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (task_id, experiment_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES Tasks(task_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (experiment_id) REFERENCES Experiments(experiment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Task_Logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    task_id INT,
    log_message TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES Tasks(task_id)
);
